'use client' import { useUser } from '@clerk/nextjs' import { SignInButton, UserButton } from '@clerk/nextjs' import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button' import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card' import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge' import { Tabs, TabsContent, TabsList, TabsTrigger } from '@/components/ui/tabs' import AdvancedCodeGenerator from '@/components/generation/AdvancedCodeGenerator' import AdvancedDashboard from '@/components/dashboard/AdvancedDashboard' import { Sparkles, Code, BarChart3, Zap, Users, Globe, Database, Shield, Rocket } from 'lucide-react' export default function HomePage() { const { isSignedIn, user } = useUser() if (!isSignedIn) { return (
{/* Header */}

Rork AI Builder

Enterprise Edition
{/* Hero Section */}

Cr√©ez des applications IA en quelques clics

Plateforme compl√®te de cr√©ation d'applications IA avec g√©n√©ration de code, collaboration temps r√©el, et outils avanc√©s pour d√©veloppeurs et entreprises.

{/* Features Grid */}
G√©n√©ration de Code IA Cr√©ez des applications compl√®tes avec des prompts en langage naturel Collaboration Temps R√©el Travaillez en √©quipe avec synchronisation en temps r√©el Analytics Avanc√©es Suivez les performances et optimisez vos applications Multi-Provider IA OpenAI, Anthropic, Mistral, Google Gemini et plus S√©curit√© Enterprise Authentification, paiements, monitoring int√©gr√©s D√©ploiement Global D√©ployez sur Vercel, Render, AWS en un clic
{/* CTA Section */}

Pr√™t √† r√©volutionner votre d√©veloppement ?

Rejoignez des milliers de d√©veloppeurs qui cr√©ent d√©j√† avec l'IA

) } return (
{/* Header */}

Rork AI Builder

Enterprise Edition
Bienvenue, {user?.firstName || user?.emailAddresses[0]?.emailAddress} !
{/* Main Content */}

Dashboard Rork AI Builder

Cr√©ez, collaborez et d√©ployez des applications IA en quelques minutes

G√©n√©rateur IA Dashboard
) }

source:
'use client' import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useUser } from '@clerk/nextjs' import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card' import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button' import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge' import { Tabs, TabsContent, TabsList, TabsTrigger } from '@/components/ui/tabs' import { Progress } from '@/components/ui/progress' import { Shield, Users, Database, BarChart3, Settings, AlertTriangle, CheckCircle, XCircle, TrendingUp, TrendingDown, Activity, Globe, Zap, Crown, Eye, Edit, Trash2, Download, RefreshCw } from 'lucide-react' interface AdminStats { totalUsers: number totalProjects: number totalGenerations: number totalRevenue: number activeUsers: number systemHealth: { database: 'healthy' | 'warning' | 'error' redis: 'healthy' | 'warning' | 'error' ai: 'healthy' | 'warning' | 'error' storage: 'healthy' | 'warning' | 'error' } } interface User { id: string email: string plan: string createdAt: string lastLoginAt: string projectsCount: number generationsUsed: number isActive: boolean } interface SystemAlert { id: string type: 'error' | 'warning' | 'info' title: string message: string timestamp: string resolved: boolean } interface UsageMetric { date: string users: number projects: number generations: number revenue: number } export default function AdminPanel() { const { user } = useUser() const [stats, setStats] = useState(null) const [users, setUsers] = useState([]) const [alerts, setAlerts] = useState([]) const [metrics, setMetrics] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview') // V√©rifier si l'utilisateur est admin const isAdmin = user?.publicMetadata?.role === 'admin' useEffect(() => { if (!isAdmin) return const loadAdminData = async () => { try { setLoading(true) // Charger les statistiques const statsResponse = await fetch('/api/admin/stats') if (statsResponse.ok) { const statsData = await statsResponse.json() setStats(statsData) } // Charger les utilisateurs const usersResponse = await fetch('/api/admin/users') if (usersResponse.ok) { const usersData = await usersResponse.json() setUsers(usersData) } // Charger les alertes const alertsResponse = await fetch('/api/admin/alerts') if (alertsResponse.ok) { const alertsData = await alertsResponse.json() setAlerts(alertsData) } // Charger les m√©triques const metricsResponse = await fetch('/api/admin/metrics') if (metricsResponse.ok) { const metricsData = await metricsResponse.json() setMetrics(metricsData) } } catch (error) { console.error('Erreur chargement donn√©es admin:', error) } finally { setLoading(false) } } loadAdminData() }, [isAdmin]) if (!isAdmin) { return (

Acc√®s Refus√©

Vous n'avez pas les permissions n√©cessaires pour acc√©der au panel d'administration.

) } if (loading) { return (
) } return (
{/* Header */}

Panel d'Administration

Gestion et monitoring de la plateforme Rork AI Builder

Admin
{/* Statistiques rapides */} {stats && (

Utilisateurs

{stats.totalUsers.toLocaleString()}

+12% ce mois

Projets

{stats.totalProjects.toLocaleString()}

+8% ce mois

G√©n√©rations

{stats.totalGenerations.toLocaleString()}

+25% ce mois

Revenus

‚Ç¨{stats.totalRevenue.toLocaleString()}

+15% ce mois

)} {/* Sant√© du syst√®me */} {stats && ( Sant√© du Syst√®me
{Object.entries(stats.systemHealth).map(([service, status]) => (
{status === 'healthy' && } {status === 'warning' && } {status === 'error' && } {service}
{status}
))}
)} {/* Contenu principal avec tabs */} Vue d'ensemble Utilisateurs Alertes Analytics
{/* M√©triques d'utilisation */} M√©triques d'Utilisation
Utilisateurs Actifs {stats?.activeUsers || 0}
G√©n√©rations ce mois {stats?.totalGenerations || 0}
Projets cr√©√©s {stats?.totalProjects || 0}
{/* Alertes r√©centes */} Alertes R√©centes
{alerts.slice(0, 5).map((alert) => (
{alert.type === 'error' && } {alert.type === 'warning' && } {alert.type === 'info' && }

{alert.title}

{alert.message}

{new Date(alert.timestamp).toLocaleString()}

{!alert.resolved && ( )}
))}
Gestion des Utilisateurs
{users.map((user) => (
{user.email.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}

{user.email}

Inscrit le {new Date(user.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}

{user.projectsCount} projets {user.generationsUsed} g√©n√©rations
{user.isActive ? 'Actif' : 'Inactif'}
{user.plan}
))}
Gestion des Alertes
{alerts.map((alert) => (
{alert.type === 'error' && } {alert.type === 'warning' && } {alert.type === 'info' && }

{alert.title}

{alert.message}

{new Date(alert.timestamp).toLocaleString()}

{alert.resolved ? ( R√©solue ) : ( <> )}
))}
√âvolution des Utilisateurs
Graphique des utilisateurs (√† impl√©menter)
Revenus
Graphique des revenus (√† impl√©menter)
) }

messages.message: An interface declaring no members is equivalent to its supertype.

suggestions.desc: Replace empty interface with a type alias.

messages.message: 'CodeExecutionSchema' is assigned a value but only used as a type.
'framework' is assigned a value but never used.
'fullHTML' is never reassigned. Use 'const' instead.

fix.text:
const fullHTML = `<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="fr">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Application G√©n√©r√©e</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <style>
        ${css || ''}
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    ${html}
    ${javascript ? `<script>${javascript}</script>` : ''}
</body>
</html>`
